content:
The Armed Forces of the Armed Forces reported that on the night of March 28, Russian troops attacked Ukraine by shock UAVs of the Shahed UAV, 26 of which were destroyed.

About thisreportedLieutenant General Mykola Oleshchuk, Commander of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces.

Thus, the enemy struck a rocket-aviation strike in Ukraine with the use of three winged X-22 missiles and anti-radiolocation missile X-31P (from the Black Sea), the S-300 anti-aircraft managed missile (Donets (Kursk region - Russian region, Cape Chaud - Crimea).

"Air Force's anti -aircraft missile units, mobile fire groups and radio electronic struggle forces of Ukraine," he said.

26 shaped-136/131 shock UAVs were destroyed within the Odessa, Kharkiv, Dnipropetrovsk and Zaporizhzhya regions.

As reportedArmyinform, on the night of March 27, the Russians attacked Ukraine with 13 shock drones such as Shahd, 10 of which managed to destroy.
title: 26 of the 28 Shakhs were destroyed: the air forces were informed by the details of the reflected attacks of the Russian Federation
description: This was reported by the Commander of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces Lieutenant General Mykola Oleshchuk. Yes, enemy ...
author: Army Inform
